name: ZOOM__GET_MEETINGS
description: Retrieve all scheduled meetings for a user with their settings, participants, and schedule information

user_id.description: User ID or email address to get meetings for

page_size.description: Number of meetings to return per page

name: ZOOM__CREATE_MEETING
description: Schedule a new Zoom meeting with participants, settings, and agenda for video collaboration

user_id.description: User ID or email address creating the meeting

type.description: Meeting type (1=instant, 2=scheduled, 3=recurring no fixed time, 8=recurring fixed time)

start_time.description: Meeting start time in ISO 8601 format

join_before_host.description: Allow participants to join before host

name: ZOOM__UPDATE_MEETING
description: Update an existing Zoom meeting's details, schedule, settings, or participants

name: ZOOM__DELETE_MEETING
description: Delete or cancel a scheduled Zoom meeting and notify participants

occurrence_id.description: Specific occurrence ID for recurring meetings

schedule_for_reminder.description: Whether to send cancellation email to registrants

name: ZOOM__GET_MEETING_PARTICIPANTS
description: Retrieve list of participants who joined a specific Zoom meeting with their join/leave times and details

meeting_id.description: Meeting ID or UUID to get participants for

page_size.description: Number of participants to return per page

name: ZOOM__GET_RECORDINGS
description: Retrieve meeting and webinar recordings for a user with download URLs and metadata

user_id.description: User ID or email address to get recordings for

page_size.description: Number of recordings to return per page

name: ZOOM__CREATE_WEBINAR
description: Create a new webinar in Zoom for large-scale presentations and educational events with registration management

user_id.description: User ID or email address creating the webinar

type.description: Webinar type (5=regular, 6=recurring no fixed time, 9=recurring fixed time)

name: ZOOM__GET_WEBINARS
description: Retrieve all webinars for a user with their registration settings and attendee information

user_id.description: User ID or email address to get webinars for

page_size.description: Number of webinars to return per page

name: ZOOM__GET_USERS
description: Retrieve all users in the Zoom account for user management and meeting assignment

page_size.description: Number of users to return per page

name: ZOOM__CREATE_USER
description: Create a new user account in Zoom organization with role assignment and profile information

name: ZOOM__GET_WEBINAR_REGISTRANTS
description: Retrieve list of registrants for a webinar including their registration details and approval status

webinar_id.description: Webinar ID to get registrants for

page_size.description: Number of registrants to return per page

name: ZOOM__CREATE_MEETING_REGISTRATION
description: Register a participant for a meeting that requires registration with their contact information

meeting_id.description: Meeting ID to register participant for

name: ZOOM__GET_MEETING_ANALYTICS
description: Retrieve analytics and metrics for meetings including attendance, engagement, and participation data

type.description: Type of meetings to get analytics for

page_size.description: Number of meetings to return per page

name: ZOOM__CREATE_WEBHOOK_SUBSCRIPTION
description: Create webhook subscriptions to receive real-time notifications for meeting events, registrations, and recordings

events.description: Events to subscribe to for notifications

auth_user.description: Basic authentication username for webhook endpoint

auth_password.description: Basic authentication password for webhook endpoint

name: ZOOM__GET_ACCOUNT_SETTINGS
description: Retrieve Zoom account settings including security policies, meeting defaults, and feature configurations

account_id.description: Account ID to get settings for

name: ZOOM__GET_CLOUD_RECORDINGS
description: Retrieve cloud recordings with download links, transcripts, and sharing options for meeting archives

meeting_id.description: Meeting ID or UUID to get recordings for

ttl.description: Time to live for download access token in seconds

name: ZOOM__START_MEETING_RECORDING
description: Start cloud recording for an active meeting to capture video, audio, and screen sharing content

meeting_id.description: Meeting ID or UUID to start recording for

name: ZOOM__GET_MEETING_POLLS
description: Retrieve polls created for a meeting including questions, options, and participant responses

meeting_id.description: Meeting ID to get polls for

name: ZOOM__CREATE_MEETING_POLL
description: Create an interactive poll for a meeting to engage participants and gather feedback during video calls

meeting_id.description: Meeting ID to create poll for

type.description: Question type (single choice or multiple choice)
